value:
$nMPID_シグルド|Deirdre has not had a chance to grow
accustomed to events such as this...$k$pIf you can make her time here any
more pleasant, I'll be in your debt.

$nMPID_ディアドラ|The steady pulse of the music, and
all the smiling, dancing people... I feel
I've found myself in a fantasy world...

$nMPID_シグルド|I have yet to see you dancing...
Tend to avoid such things, do you?
Well, I could teach you the basics...

$nMPID_ディアドラ|The atmosphere here is building,
growing with such excitement,
I may burst...

$nMPID_シグルド|Deirdre has lived much of her life
in a remote area of the Spirit Forest,
and yet...she seems to belong here.$k$pShe truly is the woman of my dreams.

$nMPID_シグルド|I am here to extend an invitation.
A ball will be held this evening,
hosted by $Nf.

$nMPID_ディアドラ|♪ I am having...truly the most
wonderful time, Sigurd.

$nMPID_シグルド|Take a look around. Everyone here
is enchanted by my dear Deirdre...

$nMPID_ディアドラ|Oh. For me? What do you think,
Lord Sigurd? Is it flattering?

This is the ball we were told of, yes?
I am Sigurd, and this is Deirdre, my
lovely wife. The pleasure is ours.

$nMPID_シグルド|Deirdre, are you not tired? You need
only say the word, and I will bid all
a good night, and we can retur—$k$p$nMPID_ディアドラ|I am all right, Lord Sigurd... I really
am enjoying these moments, from
the bottom of my heart. And yet...$k$p$nMPID_シグルド|Yet what? Please, do not hesitate
to speak your mind. I am your dear
husband after all, Deirdre.$k$p$nMPID_ディアドラ|Of course... It's just that...I am here
with my adoring husband, and there
are so many other kind faces...$k$pI am overwhelmed by my blessings.
It feels just like a dream, so I fear
it might slip away at any moment.$k$p$nMPID_シグルド|Well, let me assure you that there is
nothing to worry about. As long as
I am with you, the dream goes on.$k$pAnd as such, we ought to return
to our dance... Can I take your
hand, dearest?$k$p$nMPID_ディアドラ|Yes. As long as I am by your side...
hold me close and never let go, and
let us stay in this moment forever.
てやっ
Prepare yourself!
ああっ
Even if only you...
$nMPID_二人|I promise!
$nMPID_二人|I'll watch over you. Oh, Lord Sigurd...
Let us dance together.
$nMPID_ディアドラ|Only if it is with you.
No...
You are my one true...
Be careful.
I'm praying for you.

• Deirdre, my love...
• Lord Sigurd...

• Let us never be apart.
• Of course, dearest.
Haha...

• You're a vision in that gown, Deirdre.
• And you look exceptionally charming, my dear Lord Sigurd.
Let us dance.
Your hand?
Please, lead on.
$nMPID_シグルド|Would you care to dance, my love?
$nMPID_ディアドラ|It would be my pleasure.

$nMPID_シグルド|To dance with you feels as though
I've yet to awaken from a wonderful
dream.
$nMPID_ディアドラ|It's a dream we share together.

$nMPID_シグルド|I'm truly sorry for causing you
such endless worry. Can you
ever forgive me?

$nMPID_ディアドラ|You need not apologize, Sigurd. To
have this time with you makes me
more than happy.

$nMPID_シグルド|Oh, Deirdre... You are truly a selfless
woman.

It would not hurt you to make
a selfish request every once in
a while.$k$pNor would it trouble me to tend
to your wishes.

$nMPID_ディアドラ|You want me to make a selfish
request? Hmm... I wonder what I
should ask for...

Perhaps you would save the last
dance of the festival for me?

$nMPID_シグルド|Hm. I would hardly call that selfish.
The last dance of every gala, ball,
and festival belongs to you already.

$nMPID_ディアドラ|But when I think of everyone
else here...

$nMPID_シグルド|You question why I choose to dance
with you? That you should think my
love is mere fancy! You wound me.

$nMPID_ディアドラ|Oh, no! Lord Sigurd, I never meant
to question—

$nMPID_シグルド|I merely tease. I'm sorry for being
so cruel. Your moments of doubt
endear me so.

Now, let us choose to dance with one
another. You are my one and only
partner, and my one and only love.

$nMPID_ディアドラ|Oh, Sigurd... I love you the same.
Yes, let's dance.
